description: This source file implements backend APIs for managing routing configurations in a data model, including create, initialize, remove, and registration functions for routers, routing entries (IPv4 and IPv6), RIP interfaces, and static routes.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_ROUTING
classes.description: Main data model structure for routing configurations, containing lists of routers, RIP interfaces, static routes, and related counters.

classes.name: COSA_DML_ROUTER_FULL2
classes.description: Represents a full router configuration including its routing entries and forwarding information.

classes.name: COSA_DML_ROUTING_V4_ENTRY
classes.description: Represents an IPv4 routing entry within a router.

classes.name: COSA_DML_ROUTING_V6_ENTRY
classes.description: Represents an IPv6 routing entry within a router.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaRoutingCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Constructs a new routing data model object and initializes it.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRoutingInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the routing data model including static routes, routers, IPv4/IPv6 forwarding entries, and RIP interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRoutingRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Removes and frees all routing data, including static routes, routers, forwarding entries, and interface configurations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRoutingRegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves current routing configuration information from persistent storage into the data model.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRoutingRegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Adds a routing configuration entry into the persistent storage and updates the hierarchy accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaRoutingRegDelInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Deletes a routing configuration entry from the persistent storage and hierarchy.

ctags.name: CosaRoutingRegAddInfo
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
